flavorText: Ravnica held its breath as the hero of the resistance—their last hope—flew through the sky, his dark sword ready to strike a god.

foreignData.flavorText: Ravnica hielt den Atem an, als der Held des Widerstands — ihre letzte Hoffnung — durch den Himmel flog, um mit seinem schwarzen Schwert einen Gott niederzustrecken.
foreignData.name: Verzweifelter Sprung

foreignData.flavorText: 拉尼卡的最后希望就已寄托在这位仍奋力抗争的勇士身上。只见他手握乌锋一跃而起，直向神龙命门冲去～这一刻全城皆尽屏息凝视。

name: Desperate Lunge
originalText: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Desperate Lunge tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You don’t gain 2 life.
A creature gaining flying after it has been blocked by a creature without flying or reach won’t remove the blocking creature from combat or cause the creature it blocked to become unblocked.

text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
